questions.question: Considering the overall textual layout, what is the primary subject described in detail across multiple lines?
What is the specified measurement unit for the serving size, as explicitly written within the text?
Focusing on the nutritional information, what is the exact quantitative value assigned to total carbohydrates, in grams?
What is the numerical value indicated for the total calorie count per serving, as depicted in the text?
According to the provided text, what is the numerical value for the amount of total sugars, in grams, per serving?
In grams, what is the numerical value shown for the amount of protein provided per serving, based on the text?
What is the numerical percentage of the Daily Value (%DV) assigned to the total fat content, as indicated in the nutrition facts?
What is the numerical percentage of the Daily Value (%DV) indicated for the cholesterol content in the nutrition facts?
Based solely on the provided text, what is the specified amount of sodium, in milligrams (mg), per serving?
What is the numerical percentage of the Daily Value (%DV) represented for the Vitamin D content, as displayed within the text?
As indicated in the text, what is the numerical percentage of the Daily Value (%DV) associated with the calcium content?
What is the numerical percentage of the Daily Value (%DV) for iron, according to the nutrition information?
What is the numerical percentage of the Daily Value (%DV) indicated for potassium (Potas) in the nutrition facts?
What is the numerical percentage of the Daily Value (%DV) associated with Vitamin A content, as shown in the text?
What is the style of the text that provides the nutritional information; for example, is it bold, italic, underlined etc.?
